hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions:^How did Medigoron get inside that hole, and how does he get out for the credits?

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Saria's Song#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Deku Shield#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Map Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #Skulls#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: I'm a helpful hint Gossip Stone!^See, I'm helping.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #4# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #the Megaton Hammer#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Compass# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Water Temple Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Right Bottom Fake Wall Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #0# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Spirit Temple Small Key# and #the Song of Storms#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Water Temple#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Forest Temple Small Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.
